title: Baked crespelle with porcini mushrooms and spinach
ingredients: ['For the crespelle', '3 eggs', '3 tablespoons plain flour', '500ml milk', '1 pinch salt', 'For the filling', '1 tablespoons extra virgin olive oil', '1 knob butter', '1 garlic clove, crushed', '600g fresh porcini mushrooms, sliced, or 60g dried porcini, soaked in water', '1 small bunch fresh parsley, minced', '500g fresh spinach', '800ml ready made BÃ©chamel sauce', '200g grated Parmesan cheese', 'salt and pepper, to taste']
